# Model checking a toy crdt

Based off of the first (broken) version of Martin's tweet: https://twitter.com/martinkl/status/1327020435419041792?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Eembeddedtimeline%7Ctwterm%5Eprofile%3Amartinkl%7Ctwgr%%3D%3D&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fmartin.kleppmann.com%2F2020%2F07%2F06%2Fcrdt-hard-parts-hydra.html.
